meanings.sent1: The classic song was repopularized when it was featured in a new movie.
meanings.sent2: The fashion trend from the 90s has been repopularized by young influencers.
meanings.sent3: The old dance move was repopularized at the school talent show.
meanings.sent4: Her innovative approach repopularized the traditional art form.
meanings.sent5: The viral video repopularized the forgotten game among kids.
